name: Ba-Sketch-Ball
description:
Channel your inner Kobe Bryant, and do whatever you can to get to the hoop! Traverse spiky terrain, encounter increasingly difficult challenges and break back boards, in this entertainingly frustrating rage game.

Challenge yourself with the timed mode, in which you have only 30 seconds to make as many shots as you can! If you choose to make your score public, you have the chance to appear on the leaderboard.

Made for the ScoreSpace Jam #21!

Controls:

- Move - Click & Drag

- R - Restart Level

- M - Return to Menu

(Make sure you type your username if you want to submit a personal best!)

                                                                                   

Music:

The following music was used for this media project:

Music: Danger Storm by Kevin MacLeod
